column2: "Oh, <%me>! Seeing as you're hanging around, I assume you've settled back into things, yes?"
"My missions have finally started to settle down as well, so I've finally got a break! Heheh!"
"By the by, have you seen my predecessor yet? She woke up WAY before you did. I hear she's been busy, though."
"...Yep, sounds like a pretty stuck-up kid."

"Heheh, you! You were just thinking to yourself
that \"this kid thinks she SOOO important\",
right?"
"Huh!? No, I wasn't..."
"It's pretty obvious from how your photons are reacting! That's fine, think it all you want, because I don't think I'm important--I KNOW it!"
"...What? Uh, <%me>, what's with this sassy lost child?"

"I'm the 3rd Generation Claris Claes, and Vice-Commander of the Combat Unit.
Pleasure to make your acquaintance, short stuff!"
"S-short stuff?! I'M the taller one! This child's mannerisms concern me!"

"Not like I can help that. I was designed like this.
I've had this body since I was born."

"If only Sara could get just a bit taller, then I'd be taller too...
Suffice to say, you can blame her for that."
"W-wait a minute, what do you mean \"designed?\""

"Hmm? I'm pretty much an artificial creation. I'm a clone.
That easy enough to take in?"

"A... clone...
We're not in a comic, are we?"
"Not sure what that means, but if you're trying to shower me with pity, then it's none of your business."
"I've already accepted it, and so has everybody else. So that's that."
"I'm myself. As Claris Claes, I will put all my effort into what I can, myself, do. And that's that."
"Though, I will give you my thanks for your concern. Thank you."
"1. You've gotten stronger."
"2. You used to cry about it."
"I wouldn't say that I've gotten stronger. It's more that I don't have to act like I'm strong anymore."
"H-hey! You didn't need to say that! That was the past! P-A-S-T!"
"By the way, shortstuff and kiddo! I don't know your names yet!"
"Oh. I'm Hitsugi, and this is Aru."
"I see! Hitsugi and Aru. It's nice to meet you both!"
"Wai-- Aaah! I'm going to be late for a very important meeting! Gotta meet up with Sara! Later, guys!"
